name: Electro Desert
description:
Info

Top-down roguelike, where you have to defeat enemies to collect their energy to power up buildings to revive the city by electrifying it.

All assets and code were done during Siberian Game Jam.

This is a prototype and due to game jam limited time it has no sound.

Controls

WASD - move

LMB - Strong attack

RMB - Energy absorption hit
